```py
>>> idx.set_levels([['a', 'b', 'c'], [1, 2]])
MultiIndex([('a', 1),
 ('a', 2),
 ('b', 1),
 ('b', 2),
 ('c', 1),
 ('c', 2)],
 names=['foo', 'bar'])
>>> idx.set_levels(['a', 'b', 'c'], level=0)
MultiIndex([('a', 'one'),
 ('a', 'two'),
 ('b', 'one'),
 ('b', 'two'),
 ('c', 'one'),
 ('c', 'two')],
 names=['foo', 'bar'])
>>> idx.set_levels(['a', 'b'], level='bar')
MultiIndex([(1, 'a'),
 (1, 'b'),
 (2, 'a'),
 (2, 'b'),
 (3, 'a'),
 (3, 'b')],
 names=['foo', 'bar']) 
```
